ticket.title: [Patched] ActiveModel::Serialization Documentation Example Fix
ticket.original-body: The documentation for `ActiveModel::Serialization` begins with an incredibly poor example of how to implement a the ActiveModel#attributes method. The hash generated does not correctly provide the local instance values and it memoizes the result - which, that alone is already a **very** poor practice.
ticket.latest-body: The documentation for `ActiveModel::Serialization` begins with an incredibly poor example of how to implement a the ActiveModel#attributes method. The hash generated does not correctly provide the local instance values and it memoizes the result - which, that alone is already a **very** poor practice.
ticket.original-body-html: The documentation for ActiveModel::Serialization begins with an incredibly poor example of how to implement a the ActiveModel#attributes method. The hash generated does not correctly provide the local instance values and it memoizes the result - which, that alone is already a very poor practice.

version.body: The documentation for `ActiveModel::Serialization` begins with an incredibly poor example of how to implement a the ActiveModel#attributes method. The hash generated does not correctly provide the local instance values and it memoizes the result - which, that alone is already a **very** poor practice.
version.body-html: The documentation for ActiveModel::Serialization begins with an incredibly poor example of how to implement a the ActiveModel#attributes method. The hash generated does not correctly provide the local instance values and it memoizes the result - which, that alone is already a very poor practice.
version.title: ActiveModel::Serialization Documentation Example Fix

version.body: Attached is a patch to remove the memoization from the example, as well as correctly return the attribute value in the generated hash.
version.body-html: Attached is a patch to remove the memoization from the example, as well as correctly return the attribute value in the generated hash.
version.title: ActiveModel::Serialization Documentation Example Fix

version.diffable-attributes: --- :tag: activemodel documentation serialization :title: ActiveModel::Serialization Documentation Example Fix
version.title: [Patched] ActiveModel::Serialization Documentation Example Fix

version.body: Fixed the second example, as well.
version.body-html: Fixed the second example, as well.
version.title: [Patched] ActiveModel::Serialization Documentation Example Fix
